statements: SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_type = 'wood';
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, review_text FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_type = 'metal' AND rating <= 2 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, material_type, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY material_type DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_type = 'wood' OR material_type = 'metal' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_type IN ('wood', 'stone', 'plastic') ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE rating < 2 OR rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, material_type, rating, review_text FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_type LIKE '%t%' ORDER BY rating ASC, customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsReviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY feedback DESC;
SELECT review, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT material_id, review FROM BuildingMaterialsReviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsReviews ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_feedback > 2;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, material_name, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, reviewer_name, review_date FROM MaterialReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, material_name, rating, feedback_text FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT comment_id, review_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM ReviewComments WHERE comment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback WHERE material_name = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM MaterialReviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ReviewComments ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT material_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM BuildingMaterialsFeedback GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood';
SELECT customer_name, rating, comment FROM customers_feedback JOIN reviews ON customers_feedback.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
SELECT material_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM building_materials JOIN purchases ON building_materials.material_id = purchases.material_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, material_name, feedback_date FROM CustomerReviews WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE material_price < 50 ORDER BY material_price ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY review_id DESC;

SELECT customer_id, material_name, feedback_date FROM CustomerReviews INNER JOIN BuildingMaterials ON CustomerReviews.material_id = BuildingMaterials.material_id WHERE rating_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
